privacyPolicy.content:
Privacy Policy

Last Updated: July 11, 2024

Mythic Miners ('we', 'our', 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in the use of your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your information.

1. Information Collected

a. Information Provided by You: We may collect personal information that you provide directly, such as your name, email, and other contact information.

b. Automatic Information: We may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage of our website/application, such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our site/application.

2. Use of Information

a. Purpose: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, respond to inquiries, process transactions, and send communications.

b. Legal Basis: The processing of personal data is carried out based on your consent, compliance with legal obligations, and/or the legitimate interest of Mythic Miners.

3. Sharing of Information

a. Third Parties: We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating the website/application and delivering services.

b. Legal Requirement: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our legal rights.

4. Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at contact@mythicminers.com.

5. Information Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security of data transmitted over the internet.

6. Data Retention

We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law.

7. International Data Transfer

Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of Brazil, which may have different data protection laws.

8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The latest version will always be available on our website/application. We recommend that you review this Policy regularly to stay informed about our privacy practices.

9. Contact

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@mythicminers.com.
